```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}

```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
Infant_raw <- Infant_raw[ -c(2:4) ]
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
#renaming columns
names(Infant_raw)[2] <- "Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino"
names(Infant_raw)[3] <- "American_Indian_or_Alaska_Native"
names(Infant_raw)[4] <- "Asian"
names(Infant_raw)[5] <- "Black_or_African_American"
names(Infant_raw)[6] <- "Native_Hawaiian_or_other_Pacific_Islander"
names(Infant_raw)[7] <- "White"
names(Infant_raw)[8] <- "Non_Applicable"
names(Infant_raw)[11] <- "Random_Contact"
names(Infant_raw)[12] <- "Prescreen_Survey"
names(Infant_raw)[13] <- "Phone_Screen"
names(Infant_raw)[14] <- "IDR"
names(Infant_raw)[15] <- "Consent"
names(Infant_raw)[16] <- "Complete"
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
#renaming rows
Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino=recode(Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino,
                              "0"="Uncheked",
                              "1"="No",
                              "2"= "Yes",
                              "3"= "NA"
                               ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(American_Indian_or_Alaska_Native=recode(American_Indian_or_Alaska_Native,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                               ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Asian=recode(Asian,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                               ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Black_or_African_American=recode(Black_or_African_American,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                               ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Native_Hawaiian_or_other_Pacific_Islander=recode(Native_Hawaiian_or_other_Pacific_Islander,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                               ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(White=recode(White,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                               ))
                              
Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Non_Applicable=recode(Non_Applicable,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                               ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(beachphone_hear_about_us=recode(beachphone_hear_about_us,
                              "1"="Flyer",
                              "2"="Radio",
                              "3"="Social Media",
                              "4"="Newspaper",
                              "5"="Word-of-mouth",
                              "6"="Other"
                               ))
Infant_raw[2733,9] <- "Flyer"


Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(beach_learn_about_study=recode(beach_learn_about_study,
                              "1"="Flyer",
                              "2"="Physician",
                              "3"="Social Media",
                              "4"="Mail",
                              "5"="Other"
                               ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Consent=recode(Consent,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                            ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Complete=recode(Complete,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                            ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Random_Contact=recode(Random_Contact,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                            ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Prescreen_Survey=recode(Prescreen_Survey,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                            ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Phone_Screen=recode(Phone_Screen,
                              "0"="No",
                              "1"="Yes"
                            ))

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(beachphone_pass_fail=recode(beachphone_pass_fail,
                              "1"="Pass",
                              "2"="Fail",
                              "3"="Incomplete"
                            ))


```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
Infant_raw$Recruitment = coalesce(Infant_raw$beachphone_hear_about_us, Infant_raw$beach_learn_about_study)

Infant_raw=Infant_raw %>%
  mutate(Recruitment=recode(Recruitment,
                              "0"="Incomplete"
                            ))

```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant= filter(Infant_raw, Consent == "Yes")

```

vtree(Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant, "Recruitment Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino", palette = 3, sortfill = TRUE, horiz=FALSE)

#anaylsis
```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
HL_ana_infant = select(filter(Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant, Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino %in% c("Yes","No")), c(Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino, Recruitment))
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
chisq.test(HL_ana_infant$Recruitment, HL_ana_infant$Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino, correct=FALSE)
#X^2=9.3347
#p=0.02516
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
AI_AN_ana_infant = select(filter(Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant, American_Indian_or_Alaska_Native%in% c("Yes","No")), c(American_Indian_or_Alaska_Native, Recruitment))
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
chisq.test(AI_AN_ana_infant$Recruitment, AI_AN_ana_infant$American_Indian_or_Alaska_Native, correct=FALSE)
#X^2=2.0488
#p=0.5623
```

#White vs Non-White
```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Race1[Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$White=="Yes"] <- "White"
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Race1[Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Are_you_Hispanic_or_Latino=="Yes"] <- "Non-White"
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Race1[Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$American_Indian_or_Alaska_Native=="Yes"] <- "Non-White"
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Race1[Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Asian=="Yes"] <- "Non-White"
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Race1[Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Black_or_African_American=="Yes"] <- "Non-White"
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Race1[Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Native_Hawaiian_or_other_Pacific_Islander=="Yes"] <- "Non-White"
Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Race1[Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant$Non_Applicable=="Yes"] <- "Non-White"


```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
vtree(Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant, "Recruitment Race1", palette = 3, sortfill = TRUE, horiz=FALSE)
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
RE_Infant1= select(filter(Consent_Race_Ethnicity_Infant),c(Recruitment, Race1))
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
RE_Infant1 <- na.omit(RE_Infant1) 
```

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
chisq.test(RE_Infant1$Recruitment, RE_Infant1$Race1, correct=FALSE)
#X^2=1.9237
#p=0.5884
```
